entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
